nodes.bodyText: Instead of setting signOutGlobally to false, should we be getting this from the passed in options variable?
In short, no per our conversation :)

For sign out locally (which this helper method is) it needs to be set to false with invalidateTokens set to true. The isGlobalSignOut option is examined in the main method which uses this helper method.

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,7 +26,7 @@
 
     /**
      * Advanced options for signing up.
-     * @param globalSignOut Sign out of all devices
+     * @param globalSignOut Sign out of all devices (do not use when signing out of a WebUI experience)
